name: vert.x
description: Vert.x is a tool-kit for building reactive applications on the JVM

commit.message: Set version to 4.3.4-SNAPSHOT
Releasing 4.3.3

Future terminal operation documentation (#4447)

* Javadoc: document behavior of Future terminal operations

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

* Add andThen method to Future API

This allows to guarantee order of execution for callbacks at the expense of creating new future instances.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

* Extract futures documentation from index.adoc

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

* Futures documentation: add caution section about terminal operations

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

* Updates after review

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

* Fix doc (compilation failure)

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

commit.message:
Behind HA proxy, remoteAddress() and localAddress() will return HA proxy header values, it should be possible to get the original connection values.

Added remoteAdress(boolean real) and localAddress(boolean real) that returns the original connection values when real is true.

fixes #4448, #3700
JsonArray.of does not need a noisy API

commit.message:
FakeClusterManager nodeId should be volatile

Fixes #4411

To avoid visibility issues

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>
ContextBase protected fields can be private

Allow Vert.x to use other Context implementations than EventLoopContext and WorkerContext.

The Context and its related classes/intefaces have been refactored to pull up code as much as possible in Context and ContextInternal in order to ease new implementations, consequently the AbstractContext class has been removed.

The ContextImpl class has been renamed ContextBase and provides a base class for implementing context.

fixes #4425

EventBus removeInboundInterceptor should use the INBOUND_INTERCEPTORS_UPDATER (#4423)

Fixes #4422

Otherwise, no inbound interceptor will ever be removed.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

verification.payload:
tree 2f2428cf6c8793ce4109b339c13f91bdcfa026d8
parent 0bdaecf62dbb14421d0277fbfe3c90a47812f538
author Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com> 1656430987 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1656430987 +0200

EventBus removeInboundInterceptor should use the INBOUND_INTERCEPTORS_UPDATER (#4423)

Fixes #4422

Otherwise, no inbound interceptor will ever be removed.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

commit.message:
When an HTTP/2 client connects, the failure will not be reported when the server disconnects without sending the initial settings.

The VertxHttp2ConnectionHandler should fail the connect failure when it becomes inactive before the initial settings have been read instead of the current processing.

fixes #4419
JsonXxx.of add items with API for validation

commit.message:
Support reading PEM file containing EC Private Key

Added support for reading a PEM file that contains the Base64 encoding
of a DER-encoded EC private key as described in
https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5915#section-4

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
Improve test error message
Args length & null check for JsonObject.of and JsonArray.of
